name: Enlightment

Portfolio Website: https://travisenglandhewlett.wordpress.com/ 

Third Project, UAL Level 3 Extended Diploma in Creative Media Production & Technology 

Developed From: 7th January – 11th February 2020 

Programmer: Travis England-Hewlett 

Visuals: Cody Bowyer 

Audio: Thomas Hall

Enlightment is a grid based puzzle game where you as the player are tasked with locating and relocating a selection of blocks around the (maze like) level in such a configuration that the light beams are reflected into their respective gates. With a limited selection blocks of contrasting rotations at your disposal determining the correct configuration of the level is paramount.
